meanings.definition: The transmission of customs or beliefs from generation to generation.
meanings.sent1: Our family's traditions include baking cookies together every Christmas.
meanings.sent2: It is a tradition in our school to have a talent show every year.
meanings.sent3: The tradition of wearing silly hats on birthdays always brings a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The tradition of passing down stories is like a torch lighting the way for future generations.
meanings.sent5: The traditions of our ancestors are like a treasure chest full of memories and wisdom.

meanings.sent1: The tradition of shaking hands as a greeting is common in many cultures.
meanings.sent2: In some countries, it is a tradition to bow as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The tradition of wearing mismatched socks on purpose is a fun way to show individuality.
meanings.sent4: The tradition of blowing out candles on a birthday cake symbolizes making a wish.
meanings.sent5: The traditions of different cultures are like colorful threads weaving a rich tapestry of humanity.
